ProbesetSummarizeEngine.cpp File Reference

Program for summarizing probeset results from the command line. Requires three main inputs: 1) layout file decribing individual probes and their grouping into probe sets. 2) clf file telling where probes are located on chip. 3) Data input files, usually cel files. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Program for summarizing probeset results from the command line. Requires three main inputs: 1) layout file decribing individual probes and their grouping into probe sets. 2) clf file telling where probes are located on chip. 3) Data input files, usually cel files.

Author:
Chuck Sugnet
Date:
Mon Oct 24 12:21:35 2005
